content.prompt: Tagore most likely makes a clear contrast between European and Asian states in order to

choices.label: argue for the modernization of Asian empires like the Qing dynasty and Tokugawa Shogunate
oppose the proliferation of global wars such as the First World War
oppose the expansion of communism in Asia
provide a counterbalance to European colonialism in Asia

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
